snippet: Professionals committed to a Wagner festival in Connecticut with digital samples of music pulled out, leading to postponement.
abstract: Organizers of Hartford Wagner Festival postpone effort to bring Wagner's Ring cycle to Connecticut with digital samples instead of traditional orchestra after backlash; announce they are canceling production of Das Rheingold planned for August, saying that several artists had withdrawn, citing threats to their careers.
lead_paragraph: Professionals committed to a Wagner festival in Connecticut with digital samples of music pulled out, leading to postponement.

headline.main: ‘Ring’ Cycle With Digital Orchestra Is Postponed
headline.print_headline: ‘Ring’ Cycle With Digital Orchestra Is Postponed
